meanings.sent1: The baby's feet were the tickliest during playtime.
meanings.sent2: Her laughter was the tickliest when her friends tickled her.
meanings.sent3: The tickliest spot on the puppy was its belly, making it squirm with joy.
meanings.sent4: The comedian's jokes had the tickliest effect on the audience, causing uncontrollable laughter.
meanings.sent5: The feather was the tickliest thing she had ever felt, sending shivers down her spine.

meanings.sent1: The fluffy feather was the tickliest when brushed against the skin.
meanings.sent2: The playful kitten's fur was the tickliest to touch.
meanings.sent3: The tickliest moment of the party was when they played the tickling game.
meanings.sent4: The surprise tickle attack was the tickliest prank of the day.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the blanket was the tickliest material she had ever felt.
